docs.text: Introduction ¶ We are system security researchers at the Pennsylvania State University. We are interested in improving systems’ security, reliability, and performance. We have built cutting-edge tools that pinpoint thousands of previously unknown bugs and vulnerabilities in famous software. We always have openings for self-motivated Ph.D. students or interns. If you are interested in joining, please contact Hong Hu or Linhai Song .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: We are system security researchers at the Pennsylvania State University. We are interested in improving systems’ security, reliability, and performance.
